channel.title: Introducing dpkg source format for git repositories
channel.description:
https://bblank.thinkmo.de/introducing-dpkg-format-gitarchive.html
> New source format >The (not yet released) package [ `dpkg-format-gitarchive` ](https://salsa.debian.org/waldi/dpkg-format-gitarchive) defines a new source format `3.0 (gitarchive)` . This format doesn't represent a real source package format, but uses a plain git repository as input to create a `3.0 (quilt)` source package that the Debian archive accepts.
The author has posed a number of open questions for feedback. I think an interaction about what features are useful for us is worth it.
